name: Final Project (Thesis)
desc: This project was developed using Python on Google Colab as part of my final thesis. The project aims to assist in identifying the freshness of beef using specific parameters. A trial video is included to demonstrate the results of identifying fresh meat, as well as other images that were still detected as 'spoiled' using the default settings.

name: Web Developer (Project-Based)
